projects.name: seerdb
projects.description: LSM storage engine with ALEX learned indexes and WiscKey key-value separation. 2.5x faster writes, 2x faster reads than RocksDB with 5x lower write amplification

projects.name: OmenDB
projects.description: Embedded vector database for Python. HNSW indexing with 8x compression, filtered search, and persistent storage. 9x faster than ChromaDB. Open source on PyPI

projects.name: Pacabot
projects.description: AI trading bot using LangGraph multi-agent system with 13 data sources including market data, SEC filings, news, and social sentiment. Real-time research with automated risk management

projects.name: Aircher
projects.description: AI coding agent with 3-layer knowledge system (SQLite + DuckDB + ChromaDB). LangGraph multi-agent orchestration with cross-session learning. ACP-compatible

projects.name: sy
projects.description: Modern rsync alternative in Rust. 2-11x faster for local ops, delta sync, SSH/S3 support. Published on crates.io and Homebrew

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Reduced test suite runtime by 90% (45 min to 5 min) by reducing syscall overhead in filesystem operations
Built Python backend API and gRPC integrations for distributed services
Developed regression testing infrastructure in Go and Python

awards.title: 2nd Place & Ingenico Winner, Money 20/20 Las Vegas 2016
awards.description: Developed cross-terminal payment application with REST API for business partnerships. Built with Go and PostgreSQL, deployed on CoreOS
